restrictions.message: You must provide a value for the 'name' and 'value' parameters

message0: new embed field %1 with name %2 with value %3 inline? %4
generator: _return = ['{name: ' + Blockly.JavaScript.valueToCode(block, 'name', Blockly.JavaScript.ORDER_ATOMIC) + ', value: ' + Blockly.JavaScript.valueToCode(block, 'value', Blockly.JavaScript.ORDER_ATOMIC) + ', inline: ' + Blockly.JavaScript.valueToCode(block, 'inline', Blockly.JavaScript.ORDER_ATOMIC) + '}', Blockly.JavaScript.ORDER_ATOMIC]
extra: <value name='name'><shadow type='text'><field name='TEXT'>name</field></shadow></value><value name='value'><shadow type='text'><field name='TEXT'>value</field></shadow></value><value name='inline'><shadow type='logic_checkbox'><field name='check'>TRUE</field></shadow></value>
